text: kya tum logon ne haajiyon kee saqaee (paanee pilaane vaale) aur masjidul haraam (khaanae kaaba kee aabaadiyon ko us shakhs ke hamasar (baraabar) bana diya hai jo khuda aur roze aakherat ke din par eemaan laaya aur khuda ke raah mein jehaad kiya khuda ke nazadeek to ye log baraabar nahin aur khuda zaalim logon kee hidaayat nahin karata hai
